newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies six issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies six issues for bond insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said Wednesday it qualified six issues for bond insurance slated for competitive sale today.
--Walnut Creek School District, Calif., $6.5 million of GO bonds.
--Fayette County School District Finance, Ky., $17.1 million of School Building revenue bonds.
--Cass County, Mich., $3 million of sanitation sewer system improvement bonds.
--Cassadaga Valley Central School District, N.Y., $2.9 million of school district bonds.
--Waxahachie, Texas, $4.5 million of GO bonds and $4.2 million of certificates of participation.
